ARABIC: رَبَّنَآ ءَاتِهِمْ ضِعْفَيْنِ مِنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ وَٱلْعَنْهُمْ لَعْنًا كَبِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Our Lord, give them double the punishment and curse them many times over!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O Lord, give them a double punishment, and put a grievous curse upon them."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Our Lord, mete out to them a double chastisement and lay upon them a mighty curse.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Lord, make them to suffer double torment and subject them to the greatest condemnation."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Our Lord! Give them double the punishment of the fire and send upon them a mighty curse!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Our Lord! Give them double torment and curse them with a mighty curse!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O our Lord! give them a double punishment and curse them with a great curse.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Our Lord, give them chastisement twofold, and curse them with a mighty curse!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Our Lord! Oh, give them double torment and curse them with a mighty curse.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Our Lord, give them double punishment and curse them with a mighty curse."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Our Lord! give them double torment and curse them with a great curse.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Our Lord! Give them a double punishment and curse them with a mighty curse.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Our Lord! Give them double Penalty and curse them with a very great Curse!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Our Lord! give them double torment and curse them with a mighty curse!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Our Lord, let their punishment be doubled; and curse them with a mighty curse'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Lord, give them double the punishment, and curse them with a great curse.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Our Lord, give them double the punishment and curse them with a great curse."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [33:68] Our Lord, give them a double chastisement, in other words, twice the like of our chastisement, and curse them, chastise them, with numerous curses!’, with the equivalent number [of chastisements] (la‘nan kathīran, ‘numerous curses’, is also read la‘nan kabīran, [which means] ‘with a mighty curse’).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Our Lord!) they say: our Lord! (Oh, give them) the leaders and chieftains (double torment) double of what You give us of torment (and curse them with a mighty curse) and chastise them with a great chastisement.
